title: Requires prevailing rate of wages and supplements be provided for all construction projects financed by public entities
summary: Requires prevailing rate of wages and supplements be paid or provided to laborers, workmen or mechanics upon any project or program financed in whole or in part by any public authority, public agency, industrial development agency or public benefit corporation; defines "public works".
